trigger_description: This trigger fires when someone rings your doorbell.
This trigger fires when a lock detects a door-breaking event.
This trigger fires when a smart button is pressed.
This trigger fires when a door sensor opens.
This trigger fires when the camera detects someone is trying to steal a package.
This trigger fires when the camera detects that a package has been delivered.
This trigger fires when the camera detects an unknown person stays within the camera's view for a period of time.
This trigger fires when a door lock is blocked.
